sentences.chinese: 我叫莉莉，是达里加尔的老婆，玛吉的妈。

sentences.english: Project that started so that Vittel may tie to music.
sentences.chinese: 项目，开始使维特尔可绑音乐。

sentences.english: Sometimes Gaskell was happy with that and sometimes she wasn't.
sentences.chinese: 盖斯凯尔有时满意，有时则不尽然。
“怎么样，”腾格拉尔说，“你见到他了吗？”

sentences.english: Mr Holzer, ever the scientist, dismissed most of that.
sentences.chinese: 菏泽尔先生很有科学家精神地排除了多数情况。

sentences.english: 'Cause I've spent half my life out there, you wouldn't disagree.
sentences.chinese: 由于尔在表面功了泰半的时光，你们不会阻挡的。

sentences.english: Raziel is officially known as the Chief of the Supreme Mysteries.
sentences.chinese: 拉吉尔是众所周知最高的神秘主宰。

sentences.english: I can not thinking about you .
sentences.chinese: 涐不能停止対尔的思念。

sentences.english: Valeera runs up, hugs Spike, and thanks him for saving Broll.
sentences.chinese: 瓦蕾拉跑上来抱住狼牙，感激他救了布罗尔。

sentences.english: These drow Nisstyre was quietly seeking out.
sentences.chinese: 尼赛迪尔正在悄悄地寻找这些卓尔。

sentences.english: April and Corinnehad been gone from home for some time, so I had no way of knowing what they looked like.
sentences.chinese: 阿普里尔和科琳已离家多时，我无缘一睹她们的芳容。

sentences.english: It's farmer Gimbel's I said. Look, he's coming.
sentences.chinese: 这是农夫吉伯尔的，我说，看，他来了。

sentences.english: Any night. Lucille and I'd love to have you.
sentences.chinese: 露西尔和我将会很高兴同你们共进晚餐的。

sentences.english: The Arsenal manager wants to attack Villareal, playing to Arsenal's strengths of free-flowing attacking football.
sentences.chinese: 温格想以阿森纳流畅的进攻来攻击比利亚雷尔。

sentences.english: Because you'll allways be my baby .
sentences.chinese: 因为尔永远是俄的宝贝。

sentences.english: Neither Apple nor Mr. Jobs have confirmed he had the Whipple procedure.
sentences.chinese: 苹果公司和乔布斯均未证实他做过惠普尔手术。
